author: wn.com
title: Firstsource Solutions is creating more than 380 new jobs as it expands in Cardiff (Welsh ...
text: ( Source : Welsh Government ) Announcing the company's expansion today Economy Minister Edwina Hart described it as excellent news and yet another boost for the rapidly expanding financial and professional services sector in South Wales . Welsh
